review: Takes an abnormally long time to come up. Locks up frequently and reboots itself - then you get to wait several minutes for it to come up again. Once you get it working it seems to do OK though. I think it would benefit from either a better wifi receiver or antenna because 30 feet away from the router it's getting network errors even though none of the many other pieces of equipment in the house are having that problem. I wish there was a way to search for new channels in the TV but it must be done on the computer through Roku.com. I have mixed feelings as to whether or not I would buy again.
